Class MQFieldMapper.ShortMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.connectors.mqseries.MQFieldMapper
      • curam.util.connectors.mqseries.MQFieldMapper.ShortMapper
  • Enclosing class:
    MQFieldMapper

    public static class MQFieldMapper.ShortMapper
extends MQFieldMapper
    Maps a short field in a struct to/from an MQSeries message.

      • decode

        public int decode(java.lang.Object object,
                  java.lang.String encodedString)
           throws AppRuntimeException
        Decodes the given string and assigns the resulting value to the field in the struct.
        Specified by:
        decode in class MQFieldMapper
        Parameters:
        object - The struct class containing the field
        encodedString - The encoded form of the data.
        Returns:
        The number of characters consumed from the encoded string.
        Throws:
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_EXCEPTION_DECODING_FIELD - if the target struct field could not be accessed.
